lines.text:
[being a total brown-nose as Professor Boley looks at him in disgust]
I saw yuh on that television talk show, perfesser, and yuh impressed me with yer knowledge and yer know-how.

[very bad-boy, looking her over]
So you and your old man, you're not afraid of them gar-things, huh?

[cooly, looking back]
Gargoyles are a scientific fact. And they're no more dangerous than a high school drop-out on a motorcycle.
